title: Is book knowledge more important than general knowledge? - Quora

response.answer_text: In today s world of information availability and accessibility ,every means is just a source ,whether books,GK ,internet, TV, newspaper, whatsapp messages,conversation,seminar, seeing,experiencing etc etc . Choice and preference of the source of information is purely individualistic . All sources are important ,in some way or the other , but today we prefer what is fast,easy ,and interactive. Personal needs ,preference,importance and habits ,decide our individual ,sources,of information,but all sources have their own significance and importance ,for each one on us .
